title: why doesnt riot remove the gray screen and give dead players something to do?
body: the gray screen makes people feel negative due to color association to negative feelings mainly if you keep the color in game when you die maybe a slight gray effect but not all out gray.  why not give dead players a mini game while dead to earn gold as a incentive to keep playing (comeback possibility) so they arent practically drowning themselves with a toaster waiting for EACH CS present due to their lane isnt safe anymore because a Zed and 100 - 0 because of ult lets you do that these days where damage is king not counterplay even if you play safe. there should be a thing that allows you to farm while dead. Edit: my god i realized this escalated into a gameplay forum. im sorry please answer this to the best of your ability.
